abstract: Having torn her team apart, Brooke Partridge had to figure out how to hold those who remained together.
snippet: Having torn her team apart, Brooke Partridge had to figure out how to hold those who remained together.
lead_paragraph: Vital Wave Consulting is a strategy consulting firm that helps technology companies find business in emerging markets. It is based in Palo Alto, Calif., and its clients have included Microsoft, Intel and the World Bank. But when the recession hit, its revenue fell by more than 50 percent.

headline.main: How I Saved My Company: Vital Wave Consulting

abstract: Sure, Hewlett-Packard appears to have made an aggressive play by trumping Dell’s bid for 3Par. But one technology analyst wonders why H.P. did not try to steal McAfee away from Intel instead.
snippet: Sure, Hewlett-Packard appears to have made an aggressive play by trumping Dell’s bid for 3Par. But one technology analyst wonders why H.P. did not try to steal McAfee away from Intel instead.
lead_paragraph: Sure, Hewlett-Packard appears to have made an aggressive play by trumping Dell‘s bid for 3Par, a data storage company. Indeed, the bidding war seemed to be heating up even further on Wednesday, with Reuters reporting that Dell was getting ready to come back with a higher bid.

headline.main: Should H.P. Dump Its 3Par Bid for McAfee?

abstract: Amazon introduces an e-book reader that everyone (except Amazon) calls the Kindle 3. It’s a response to the iPad, with improved E Ink screen technology.
snippet: Amazon introduces an e-book reader that everyone (except Amazon) calls the Kindle 3. It’s a response to the iPad, with improved E Ink screen technology.
lead_paragraph: Too bad there’s not a reality TV show called “America’s Most Freaked-Out Tech-Company Meetings,” where you watch classic panicked board meetings. For example, when the Apple employee left an iPhone 4 prototype in a bar. Or when Intel learned that its Pentium chip contained a math error. Or when Microsoft was caught bribing bloggers with $2,500 laptops to promote Windows Vista.

headline.main: New Kindle Leaves Rivals Farther Back
headline.print_headline: New Kindle Leaves Rivals Farther Back
